question: In which of the following years Jahangir with the help of Maratha sardars , Khan-i- Khanan inflicted a crushing defeat on the combined forces of Ahmadnagar, Bijapur, and Golconda?
explanation: The Mughal emperor Jahangir with the help of Maratha sardars , Khan-i-Khanan in 1616 A.D. inflicted a crushing defeat on the combined forces of Ahmadnagar, Bijapur, and Golconda.
